original_text: if you transgress the covenant of the Lord your God, which he commanded you, and go and serve other gods and bow down to them. Then the anger of the Lord will be kindled against you, and you shall perish quickly from off the good land that he has given to you.”
korean_text: 만일 너희가 너희의 하나님 여호와께서 너희에게 명령하신 언약을 범하고 가서 다른 신들을 섬겨 그들에게 절하면 여호와의 진노가 너희에게 미치리니 너희에게 주신 아름다운 땅에서 너희가 속히 멸망하리라 하니라

sentences.original_text: if you transgress the covenant of the Lord your God,
sentences.korean_translation: 만일 너희가 너희 하나님 여호와의 언약을 범하고

sentences.original_text: and go and serve other gods
Then the anger of the Lord will be kindled against you,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 여호와의 진노가 너희에게 향하여 불타오르고

sentences.original_text: that he has given to you.”
